column1: Little Goat Diner////Five of us had breakfast at Little Goat Diner last weekend.  I was not overly excited about the food
column2: the coffee or the service.  I ordered a veggie omelette and the omelette was greasy
column3: flat (not fluffy like most omelettes) and the veggies were tasteless.  Toast needed to be ordered a la carte for an extra $3.  The brewed coffee and the lattes were lukewarm.  We said something to our server about the temp of the coffee and nothing changed with the next round of coffees.  We mentioned it again and no solution was offered.  Our server seemed nice
column4: but was not engaged with us
column5: friendly or warm/welcoming.  The whole experience was very mediocre.  I don't plan to return soon or recommend Little Goat Diner to friends.
